Imports

entityId, world, archetypeStore

Types

RawSpawn[C] = proc (): NewArchSlot[C]
A callback for populating a component with values 
Spawn[C] = distinct RawSpawn[C]
Describes a type that is able to create new entities. Where C is a tuple with all the components to initially attach to this entity

Procs

proc beginSpawn[Archs: enum; Comps: tuple](world: var World[Archs];
    store: var ArchetypeStore[Archs, Comps]): NewArchSlot[Comps] {.inline.}
Spawns an entity in this archetype 
proc set[C: tuple](spawn: Spawn[C]; values: sink C): EntityId {.inline,
    discardable.}
Spawns an entity with the given components

Templates

template with[C: tuple](spawn: Spawn[C]; values: varargs[typed]): EntityId
spawns the given values
